<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add mangled symbols for the given GlobalValues to SymbolFlags.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If a SymbolToDefinitionMap pointer is supplied then it will be populated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// with Name-to-GlobalValue&#42; mappings. Note that this mapping is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// necessarily one-to-one: thread-local GlobalValues, for example, may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// produce more than one symbol, in which case the map will contain duplicate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
